trigger.name: MySQL SQL Node is not alive

trigger.expression: {MySQL MGM:sql.suggested_node.avg(90)}={MySQL MGM:sql.suggested_node.last()} & {MySQL MGM:sql.node.avg(90)} = {MySQL MGM:sql.node.last()} & {MySQL MGM:sql.suggested_node.last()}>{MySQL MGM:sql.node.last()}
trigger.name: SQL Overload

trigger.expression: {MySQL MGM:sql.suggested_node.avg(300)}={MySQL MGM:sql.suggested_node.last()} & {MySQL MGM:sql.node.avg(300)} = {MySQL MGM:sql.node.last()} & {MySQL MGM:sql.suggested_node.last()}<{MySQL MGM:sql.node.last()}
trigger.name: SQL too low
